welcome_message_body: Welcome to Daloa, Côte d’Ivoire! Known for its vibrant culture and beautiful landscapes, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chawarma
restaurants.description: Chawarma is a fast food restaurant located in Daloa.

restaurants.description: Le Pam's Cave is a african restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daloa Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Daloa Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
